name: GTH-Got To Hack
description: Xander Lestrange (Hoax - H04X) - The story is about a freelance grey hat hacker Xander Lestrange AKA HOAX, a grey hat hacker who works for a cyber-security company called "ALIVESEC", they help companies all around the world by hacking in and finding out the security weaknesses and report them. As of 2018 many hackers are now opted to break into buildings and steal or manipulate valuable data. It is ALIVESEC's responsibility to provide them the security they deserve or need and for that, he must HACK.
